page.title: 04Business,Sherburn-in-Elmet.
page.content: {Shops and Businesses in Sherburn.} Sherburn has over forty shops.There are four general grocery shops,the Co-op,V.G.,Cost Cutter and Highfield Stores.There are three bakers shops,Coffee Cake, Hebberts and Crusties.There are two butchers Jacksons and Starkeys.Other food shops include a greengrocers,a health food shop and an off licence.There is a good range of non-food shops,the post office,two newsagents,two wool shops,two ladies hairdressers and a barbers shop.There is also a chemists,cycle repairs,second hand furniture,carpet shop,two ladies clothes and one men's outfitters.There is a D.I.Y.shop and a paint shop,an art shop,an electrical shop and a video hire shop,two fish and chip shops,a travel shop and a betting shop.
